title: Brown Moss Nature Reserve Walking Route

images.title: Charles Leventon / Brown Moss Nature Reserve
images.caption: The water level in the meres was particularly low at the time when this picture was taken - July 2005

images.title: Brown Moss by Brian Norman, CC BY-SA 2.0 <https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0>, via Wikimedia Commons
images.caption: A spring view over the lake.

description: Enjoy a series of walking trails in this delightful nature reserve near Whitchurch. The site is 77 acres and includes marshes, pools, heathland and woodland. It's great for bird watching with woodpeckers, jays, Canada goose, mallard and great crested grebe regular visitors. Look out for froglets, dragonflies and great crested newts around the wetland areas.
